body:
Top-level view of subrepos against vs 1.4. Look at x/tools: green but for freebsd-386:

![screen shot 2015-08-03 at 3 25 37 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8528975/9049170/0d1b8aa6-39f4-11e5-8b7b-7d03ebcbce1d.png)

x/tools repo:

![screen shot 2015-08-03 at 3 25 56 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8528975/9049198/51d62d5e-39f4-11e5-80f2-9606e265ea3f.png)

First row is not showing entirely (has missing entries), some columns are red.

Yes, the std lib revision hash is different, but why would the top-level view now show the top-most row of each sub-repo? Which one does it show?

At the very least it's confusing. I don't know how to judge whether the sub-repo is green or not.
